items.sentence: I don\'t think Tom would be surprised if Mary did that.
I don\'t think Tom would be willing to help us do that.
I don\'t think that Tom knows anything about Australia.
Tom should tell Mary that she doesn\'t need to do that.
I can\'t believe Tom would gossip about Mary like that.
I can\'t believe that Tom would do something like that.
I want you to know I\'m willing to help if you need me.
Would you rather go sailing or swimming this afternoon?
I\'m not sure that anybody would be willing to help me.
I\'m sure Tom would be able to help me if he were here.
